title: Longford circuit: Australia’s original, terrifying, high-speed arena
summary: Sometimes known as the ‘Reims of the South Pacific’ due to its long, fast straights and undulations, Longford has a special place in the hearts of Australian motor racing fans…

qa_pairs.question: What nickname is sometimes given to the Longford circuit in Australia?
What type of circuit is Longford primarily known for?
Why do Australian motor racing fans have a special affection for Longford?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It has long, fast straights and undulations
wrong_options: It is the oldest circuit in Australia
It hosted the first Formula 1 race in Australia
It features a unique night race setup
